mapper.select: SELECT FROM t_fixed_area order by C_ID desc

select from t_fixed_area where C_ID LIKE concat(concat('%', #{keyword}),'%') or C_COMPANY LIKE concat(concat('%', #{keyword}),'%') or C_FIXED_AREA_LEADER LIKE concat(concat('%', #{keyword}),'%') or C_FIXED_AREA_NAME LIKE concat(concat('%', #{keyword}),'%') or C_TELEPHONE LIKE concat(concat('%', #{keyword}),'%') limit #{pageNum},#{pageSize}

select count(*) from t_fixed_area where C_ID LIKE concat(concat('%', #{keyword}),'%') or C_COMPANY LIKE concat(concat('%', #{keyword}),'%') or C_FIXED_AREA_LEADER LIKE concat(concat('%', #{keyword}),'%') or C_FIXED_AREA_NAME LIKE concat(concat('%', #{keyword}),'%') or C_TELEPHONE LIKE concat(concat('%', #{keyword}),'%')
